item.title: Bleach Tarot Cards - Ichigo THE FOOL
item.media:description:
Description: tarot card thing i drew of ichigo. i chose ichigo as the fool because it is the first of the 22 major arcana (0) and he IS the main character. you see, oh farget this you want too know more read the wikipedia page like i had to! if you read it you will know why i chose ichigo and stuff. i\'m not going to wirte a report on it!

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tarot#Psychological

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Fool_%28Tarot_card%29

i don\'t belive in tarot but i like what the 22 major arcana represent.
Comments: 7
Kudos: 2
item.author: wonderwicerocks

item.title: The King Stands Alone
item.media:description:
Description: Grimmjow Jaggerjack 6 Espada, Basic body Study. OK this took a few days to do... longer than I thought. Sketch and wash with watercolor and clean up/blending in CS3.
Comments: 10
Kudos: 4
item.author: SpiritOnParole

item.title: The Hearts Surrender
item.media:description:
Description: This piece is entirely done in CS3. I like drawing by hand first most of the time. It's actually easier for me than doing it all on the computer. But I save money doing it this way. My first official couple... Ulquiorra and Orihime... I don't know why I chose to do them. I liked the title I decided on... it just felt right.
Comments: 7
Kudos: 3
item.author: SpiritOnParole
